amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for waste water treatment plants impacted by Typhoon Yutu by $8,800,000 based on EPA cost estimates for repair and resiliency updated on March 20, 2019.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to increase funding for waste water treatment plants impacted by Typhoon Yutu by $8,800,000 based on EPA cost estimates for repair and resiliency updated on March 20, 2019.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 143 (Roll no. 198).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Sablan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 143 (Roll no. 198).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
